title: Ep. 89 "You've Got Mail"
description:
Thanks so much to all the listeners who have emailed and dm’d us your advice letters! This week we’re cleaning out the inbox and answering all your questions and sharing your cocktales. Plus, we wanted some advice from our past so we call an ex!
